position_rationale: The candidate has a strong focus on front-end technologies such as CSS3, Tailwind CSS, responsive design, and a good understanding of RESTful APIs and GraphQL, making them well-suited for a Front-End Web Developer role.
questions: {"inferredPosition":"Front-End Web Developer","positionRationale":"The candidate has a strong focus on front-end technologies such as CSS3, Tailwind CSS, responsive design, and a good understanding of RESTful APIs and GraphQL, making them well-suited for a Front-End Web Developer role.","questions":[{"id":1,"question":"Can you explain how you would use CSS3 and Tailwind CSS to create a responsive web design?","category":"technical","skillsTested":["CSS3","Tailwind CSS","Responsive Design"],"suggestedAnswer":"I would start by using CSS3 to define the basic structure and styles for the webpage, ensuring semantic HTML is used.
